HBASE_BLOCK_CACHE_EXPRESS.description: The cache-hit ratio for reads configured to look in the cache

HBASE_COMPACTION_QUEUE.description: The number of Stores in the Region Server that have been targeted for compaction

HBASE_FLUSH_QUEUE.description: The number of enqueued regions in the MemStore awaiting flush

HBASE_LOCAL_BLOCK_RATIO.description: The percentage of HDFS blocks that are local to this Region Server

HBASE_MEMORY.description: The amount of memory used by the RegionServer.

HBASE_MEMSTORE_SIZE.description: The sum of all the memstore sizes in this Region Server

HBASE_READ_REQUESTS.description: The number of read requests for this Region Server.

HBASE_REGIONS.description: The number of regions served by the Region Server.
HBASE_REGIONS.displayName: HBase Regions in a Region Server

HBASE_SLOW_LOG_APPENDS.description: The number of slow HLog append writes for this Region Server, where "slow" is > 1 second.

HBASE_WRITE_REQUESTS.description: The number of write requests for this Region Server.
